customPlugin.description: Please go to the edit page to view details
customPlugin.title: This is a Custom Skill

emptyState.description: Please install this skill first to view its capabilities and configuration options
emptyState.title: View Skill Details After Installation

dev.confirmDeleteDevPlugin: This local skill will be deleted and cannot be recovered. Do you want to delete this skill?

useProxy.label: Install via Proxy (If you encounter cross-origin access errors, try enabling this option and reinstalling)

args.desc: List of parameters passed to the execution command, usually the MCP server name or startup script path
args.label: Command Arguments

auth.desc: Select the authentication method for the MCP server
auth.label: Authentication Type

token.desc: Enter your API Key or Bearer Token
token.label: API Key

command.desc: Executable file or script used to start the MCP STDIO Server
command.label: Command

desc.desc: Add a description for the skill
desc.label: Skill Description
desc.placeholder: Supplement usage instructions and scenarios for this skill

endpoint.desc: Enter the address of your MCP Streamable HTTP Server
endpoint.label: MCP Endpoint URL

env.desc: Enter environment variables required by your MCP Server
env.formValidationFailed: Form validation failed, please check parameter format
env.label: MCP Server Environment Variables
env.stringifyError: Unable to serialize parameters, please check parameter format

identifier.desc: Specify a name for your MCP skill, must use English characters
identifier.invalid: Identifier can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
identifier.label: MCP Skill Name

mcp.stdioNotSupported: Current environment does not support stdio type MCP skills
mcp.testConnectionTip: MCP skill can only be used normally after successful connection test

type.desc: Select MCP skill communication method, web version only supports Streamable HTTP
type.httpFeature1: Compatible with web and desktop versions
type.httpFeature2: Connect to remote MCP server without extra installation or configuration
type.label: MCP Skill Type
type.stdioFeature1: Lower communication latency, suitable for local execution
type.stdioFeature2: Requires local installation and running of MCP server
type.stdioNotAvailable: STDIO mode is only available in desktop version
type.stdioShortDesc: Communication protocol based on standard input/output
type.title: MCP Skill Type

url.desc: Enter your MCP Server Streamable HTTP address, SSE mode not supported
url.label: Streamable HTTP Endpoint URL

avatar.desc: Skill icon, can use Emoji or URL
avatar.label: Icon

identifier.desc: Unique identifier of the skill, automatically recognized from manifest
identifier.errorDuplicate: Identifier duplicates an existing skill, please modify the identifier
identifier.label: Identifier
identifier.pattenErrorMessage: Only English letters, numbers, - and _ are allowed

manifest.desc: {{appName}} will install the skill via this link
manifest.label: Skill Manifest URL

dev.modalDesc: After adding a custom skill, it can be used for skill development verification or directly in conversations. For skill development, please refer to the <1>Development Documentation↗</>.

api.noResults: No APIs matching the search criteria found

empty.desc: After configuration, you can preview the supported tool capabilities here
empty.title: Start Preview After Configuring Skill

empty.description: The skill store is full of powerful tools waiting to be discovered. Visit the store to start exploring.
empty.title: No skills available

error.fetchError: Failed to request the manifest link, please ensure the link is valid and allows cross-origin access
error.manifestInvalid: Manifest does not comply with specifications, validation result: {{error}}
error.urlError: The link did not return JSON content, please ensure it is a valid link

inspector.orphanedToolCall: This tool call message may have become orphaned due to an unexpected issue, which could affect the Agent's normal operation. Please remove it.

mcpEmpty.tools: This skill has no tool capabilities

mcpInstall.CONFIGURATION_REQUIRED: Please complete the relevant configuration before continuing installation
mcpInstall.configurationDescription: This MCP skill requires configuration parameters to function properly, please fill in the necessary information
mcpInstall.dependenciesDescription: This skill requires the following system dependencies to work properly. Please install the missing dependencies as instructed, then click recheck to continue installation.
mcpInstall.dependenciesRequired: Please install the skill's system dependencies

security.description: This skill is not officially verified, installation may pose security risks! Please ensure you trust the skill source.
security.title: ⚠️ Security Risk Warning

unverified.title: Unverified Third-Party Skill
unverified.warning: This skill is from an unverified third-party community. Please ensure you trust the source before installing.

messages.installError: Skill installation failed, please try again
messages.manifestError: Failed to get skill details, please check network connection and try again

official.description: This skill is developed and maintained by LobeHub official team, has undergone strict security review, safe to use.
official.title: Install Official Skill

protocolInstall.title: Install MCP Skill
protocolInstall.warning: ⚠️ Please confirm you trust the source of this skill. Malicious skills may harm your system security.

detail.tooLong: Text content is too long, only the first {{characters}} characters are kept in the conversation context, the rest are excluded

searchxng.description: Enter the URL of SearchXNG to start online search
searchxng.title: Configure SearchXNG Search Engine
searchxng.unconfiguredDesc: Please contact administrator to complete SearchXNG search engine configuration to start online search

settings.envConfigDescription: These configurations will be passed as environment variables to the MCP server process at startup
settings.httpTypeNotice: HTTP type MCP skills currently have no environment variables to configure

indexUrl.title: Community Index
indexUrl.tooltip: Online editing is not supported yet, please set via environment variables during deployment

settings.modalDesc: After configuring the skill community address, you can use a custom skill community.
settings.title: Skill Community Settings

showInPortal: Please view details in the workspace

actions.confirmUninstall: This skill will be uninstalled and its configuration cleared. Please confirm your action.

store.emptySelectHint: Select a skill to preview detailed information
store.networkError: Failed to fetch skill store, please check network connection and try again
store.placeholder: Search skill name, description or keywords...
store.title: Skill Store
